FuncDef: This command specifies the alarms which are enabled or outstanding against a Wave Tracker-enabled interface.
CLIs: report-alarm [ encode-fail ] [ encode-degrade ] [ power-fail ] [ power-degrade ] [ power-high ] [ power-low ] [ missing ]
no report-alarm [ encode-fail ] [ encode-degrade ] [ power-fail ] [ power-degrade ] [ power-high ] [ power-low ] [ missing ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the Power control failure alarm.
Specifies the Power control degrade alarm.
Specifies the Power control high limit reached alarm.
Specifies the Power control low limit reached alarm.
